meanings.definition: A result or effect of an action or condition.
meanings.sent1: The consequence of not studying for the test was a low grade.
meanings.sent2: She understood the consequence of her decision to stay up late.
meanings.sent3: The consequence of eating too much cake was a stomach ache.
meanings.sent4: The consequence of neglecting the garden was a jungle of weeds.
meanings.sent5: The consequence of forgetting her umbrella was getting soaked in the rain.

meanings.sent1: He realized the consequence of his role in the project.
meanings.sent2: The consequence of the meeting was to discuss future plans.
meanings.sent3: The consequence of wearing mismatched socks was a few raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The consequence of missing the bus was being late for work.
meanings.sent5: The consequence of following the recipe carefully was a delicious meal.
